T02D2092:1b-1: n'a ma sam g'i ti britti n'a ma aartha pra sa ka k'a ra na d'i pa n'a ma /

T02D2092:2a-18: mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas //
T02D2092:2a-20: rjod byed tshig gi sgo nas 'phags pa ni thabs kyi theg pa 'di nyid yin te /
T02D2092:2a-21: thabs mang ba dang thabs mkhas pa dang /
T02D2092:2a-23: thabs myur ba dang bzhis 'phags te /

T02D2092:2b-1: kyi blo la ji ltar mos pa las ma bzlog

T02D2092:2b-8: mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba //

T02D2092:2b-11: longs spyod la gnas bzhin du grol ba'i thabs ston
T02D2092:2b-14: longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal //

T02D2092:2b-18: de la 'jam dpal ni dbye na rnam pa lnga ste /

T02D2092:2b-24: de la rang bzhin rgyu'i 'jam dpal ni 'khor 'das
T02D2092:2b-25: kyi chos thams cad la chos nyid de bzhin nyid
T02D2092:2b-29: phra zhing zag med sa bon bral //
T02D2092:2b-31: de la mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa'i zug rdu bral ba dang /
T02D2092:2b-32: rtogs na kun gyi dpal du gyur pas de skad ces bya'o ;
T02D2092:2b-33: / sgom pa lam gyi 'jam dpal ni bskyed rim dang rdzogs rim la sogs te /

T02D2092:2b-36: nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas //

T02D2092:2b-40: de las bdag dang gzhan gyi don 'byung bas dpal lo //
T02D2092:2b-41: mthar thug 'bras bu'i 'jam dpal ni sku gsum ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid la bya ste /
T02D2092:2b-43: mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang //
T02D2092:2b-45: de la sku gsum ni thun mong gi dbang du byas na /
T02D2092:2b-46: chos sku skye med nam mkha' lta bu la longs
T02D2092:2b-47: spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rnam par snang mdzad sprin lta
T02D2092:2b-48: bu 'byung ba de las sprul sku sh'akya thub pa

T02D2092:2b-52: rig pa sna tshogs su 'char ba sprul pa'i sku /
T02D2092:3a-1: yang don skye mad las ma 'das pa chos kyi sku'o //
T02D2092:3a-2: de la ye shes lnga ni chos nyid skye 'gag med pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te /

T02D2092:3a-8: khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag / ces 'byung ngo //
T02D2092:3a-9: gdul bya las dag pa la snang ba'i 'jam dpal

T02D2092:3a-12: rnam pa'i bdag nyid du snang ba'i 'jam dpal ni
T02D2092:3a-13: sku'i gzugs brnyan du gyur pa ras pa la ri
T02D2092:3a-15: zangs lcags la 'phur du btod pa de rnams so //
T02D2092:3a-16: gyi zhes pa ni 'brel pa'i yi ge ste /
T02D2092:3a-17: ji skad du smos pa'i yon tan rnams dang /
T02D2092:3a-18: yon tan can rje btsun 'jam dpal du 'brel par ston te /
T02D2092:3a-19: brgya byin gyi ba phra mo zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
T02D2092:3a-20: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes pa /
T02D2092:3a-21: mtshan ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i yon tan gyi chos rnams yin la /
T02D2092:3a-22: yon tan de dag dang rje btsun nyid ldan la /

T02D2092:3a-25: zab pa don gyi sgo nas brjod pa dang /
T02D2092:3a-26: rgya che ba tshig gi sgo nas brjod pa'o //
T02D2092:3a-27: don gyi sgo nas brjod pa ni don gnyis su med pa'i ye shes su gsal ba'o //
T02D2092:3a-28: tshig gi sgo nas brjod pa la gsum ste /
T02D2092:3a-29: mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul du brjod pa dang ;
T02D2092:3a-30: gsang sngags kyi tshul du brdzod pa dang /
T02D2092:3a-31: yon tan gyi tshul du brjod pa'o //
T02D2092:3a-32: de la mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul du
T02D2092:3a-33: brjod pa ni rang gi sems kyi mtshan nyid gnyis
T02D2092:3a-34: su med pa'i ye shes su ngo shes par byas
T02D2092:3a-35: la mtshan brjod par bya ste /
T02D2092:3a-36: brjod pa'i sgra de dag byung yang skye 'gag med pa'i dang las byung la ;
T02D2092:3a-37: thim yang de nyid du thim ste /
T02D2092:3a-38: mdor na chos kyi rang sgrar shes par bya'o //
T02D2092:3a-40: gnyis med gnyis su med par ston //

T02D2092:3a-43: mtshan sngags kyi tshul du brjod pa ni bdag nyid
T02D2092:3a-44: rje btsun 'jam dpal du bskoms te mtshan brjod pas
T02D2092:3b-0: thugs @3b ka'i mum las 'od zer 'phros pas 'phags
T02D2092:3b-2: sems can gyi don byas slar rang gi thugs kar thim /
T02D2092:3b-3: yang snga ma ltar spro zhing bsdus te /

T02D2092:3b-6: gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can //

T02D2092:3b-19: zab cing rgya che'i sgra sgrogs pa //

T02D2092:3b-24: glegs bam du sdud pa'i dus su /

T02D2092:4a-8: pa'o // des mdzad pa'i phrin las ci mdzad ce na /

T02D2092:4a-12: gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul ba la /

T02D2092:4a-15: ces bya'o // rang 'jigs pa dang bral zhing gzhan gyi dpung 'joms pas dpa' la /
T02D2092:4a-16: sa 'og gi bdag po ma h'a de ba dang /
T02D2092:4a-17: sa stengs kyi bdag po khyab 'jug / sa bla'i
T02D2092:4a-18: bdag po tshangs pa dang gsum ni phyi rol pa'i
T02D2092:4a-19: sku gsung thugs kyi lha gsum yin la /

T02D2092:4a-23: rdo rje dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyal //

T02D2092:4a-27: mda' bdag tu gyur pas kyang rdo rje dbang phyug
T02D2092:4a-28: go // gsang ba'i dam tshig dang ldan zhing /
T02D2092:4a-29: nang gi nyon mongs pa dang gdug pa can rnams las rgyal bas rgyal zhes bya'o //
T02D2092:4a-30: de'i zhal ras ci 'dra zhe na /
T02D2092:4a-32: padma rgyas pa'i zhal mnga' ba //
T02D2092:4a-34: padma 'dam nas skyes kyang 'dam gyi skyon gyis ma gos pa dang 'dra bar /
T02D2092:4a-35: phyag na rdo rje nyid shin tu khro khro 'dra
T02D2092:4a-36: yang nang na nyon mongs pa med pas dkar ba'o
T02D2092:4a-37: // spyan kun du zlum pas rgyas 'dra'i spyan no //

T02D2092:4a-39: rang gi lag gi rdo rje mchog / yang dag yang du gsor byed pa //
T02D2092:4a-41: lag gi rdo rje de don gyi rtags su byung bas mchog go//
T02D2092:4a-42: yang dang yang du gsor byed pa ni /

T02D2092:4a-44: yang du skor cig bar zhu ba 'bul ba'i brda
T02D2092:4a-45: yang yin / thugs rje rgyun mi chad pas 'gro ba 'dren pa'i brda yang yin /

T02D2092:4b-0: nang na ye shes rgyun mi chad par mnga' @4b ba'i brda yang yin //

T02D2092:4b-3: khro gnyer rim par ldan la sogs //

T02D2092:4b-12: dpa' bo gdul dka' 'dul ba po //

T02D2092:4b-22: rdo rje rtse mo rab 'phro ba //

T02D2092:4b-37: ston pa mthong ba na mgu /

T02D2092:4b-39: gzugs ci dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi phrin las byed ce na //

T02D2092:4b-41: sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i mgon //
T02D2092:4b-42: lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu //

T02D2092:4b-49: tshul lam thabs ji ltar zhus she na /

T02D2092:5a-8: ma rig pa'i sgrib pa sangs rgyas shing ye shes rgyas pa ste /

T02D2092:5a-10: shes bya la yang blo rgyas phyir //
T02D2092:5a-11: sangs rgyas padmo ltar sangs rgyas //

T02D2092:5a-14: mdun du tsog tsog por 'dug nas zhus pa'o //
T02D2092:5a-15: dgos ched ci'i don du zhus she na /
T02D2092:5a-16: khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang //
T02D2092:5a-17: bdag don bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir //

T02D2092:5a-22: 'khor bdag cag rnams la sman pa dang /

T02D2092:15a-29: bya ba byas pa skam sar gnas //
T02D2092:15a-32: bsil ba chu lta bu'i chos nyid kyis nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel zhing /
T02D2092:15a-33: glo bur gyi rnam par rtog pa dri ma chu'i rnyog ma lta bu dang bral te /
T02D2092:15a-34: mig dang 'dra ba'i lta ba rig pa dang /
T02D2092:15a-35: rkang pa dang 'dra bar spyod pa zung 'brel du
T02D2092:15a-36: ldan pas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral bas bde
T02D2092:15a-37: bar gshegs pa la sems can gyi las 'phro dang
T02D2092:15a-38: / mos pa dang snod du rung mi rung dang /

T02D2092:15a-40: rang rgyal las khyad par du 'phags pas 'jig rten rig pa'i mchog go //
T02D2092:15a-41: mngon sum du snang ba 'di sgyu ma lta bur
T02D2092:15b-0: mkhyen pas phyi yul la bdag gir mi @15b 'dzin
T02D2092:15b-1: la / nang sems la ngar mi 'dzin te /
T02D2092:15b-2: rang don dang gzhan don gyi dbang gis bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas par byed do //
T02D2092:15b-4: 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar son te //
T02D2092:15b-5: bya ba byas nas stobs dang ldan pas 'dam nas
T02D2092:15b-6: 'thon pa ltar 'khor ba'i 'dam nas 'thon te byang
T02D2092:15b-7: chub kyi skam sa la gnas pa'o //
T02D2092:15b-8: de'i rgyu ni gnyis su med par rtogs pa'i ye shes 'ba' zhig la gzugs sku gnyis 'byung ba'o //
T02D2092:15b-9: des bstan pa'i cho gang zhe na //
T02D2092:15b-10: shes rab mtshon chen rnam 'joms pa //
T02D2092:15b-11: dam chos chos rgyal gsal bar ldan //
T02D2092:15b-12: 'jig rten snang bar byed pa'i mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2092:15b-13: shes rab mtshon lta bus nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'o //
T02D2092:15b-14: dam pa'i chos rgyal po lta bu thugs la gsal
T02D2092:15b-15: bar ldan pas 'jig rten pa la ye shes snang
T02D2092:15b-16: bar byed pa'o // don phra mo tsam ma yin te thar pa la sbyor ba'i mchog go //
T02D2092:15b-17: des gzhan don 'byung ba'i tshul ni /
T02D2092:15b-18: chos kyi dbang phyug cho kyi rgyal //
T02D2092:15b-19: legs pa'i lam ni ston pa po //
T02D2092:15b-20: don grub bsam pa grub pa ste //
T02D2092:15b-22: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong la rje
T02D2092:15b-23: btsun nyid dbang sgyur bas chos kyi dbang phyug go
T02D2092:15b-24: // des gdul bya rnams nyon mongs pa las rgyal
T02D2092:15b-25: bar byas nas phyin ci ma log par legs pa'i
T02D2092:15b-26: lam ji ltar 'tsham par bstan te /
T02D2092:15b-27: sems can gyi don dang bsam pa grub par byed pa'o //
T02D2092:15b-28: 'o na rje btsun nyid rtog bcas su mi 'gyur ram zhe na //
T02D2092:15b-29: kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
T02D2092:15b-30: rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad //
T02D2092:15b-31: chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shes //
T02D2092:15b-33: gzhan don mdzad kyang rtog pa med de //
T02D2092:15b-34: yang dag pa'i ye shes dang log rtog 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2092:15b-35: rnam par mi rtog kyang dbyings las yon tan zad pa med par 'byung ste /
T02D2092:15b-36: yon tan gyi 'byung khungs chos kyi dbyings la zad mi shes pa'o //
T02D2092:15b-37: de tshogs ji ltar rdzogs she na //
T02D2092:15b-38: bsod nams ldan pa bsod nams tshogs //
T02D2092:15b-39: ye shes ye shes khyad par che //
T02D2092:15b-40: ye shes ldan pa yod med shes //
T02D2092:15b-41: tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa'o //
T02D2092:15b-43: rje btsun nyid ye nas bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ldan la /
T02D2092:16a-1: phyir nyid kyang tshogs sogs pa'i tshul ston pa'o //
T02D2092:16a-2: ye shes kyi tshogs dang yang ldan te /
T02D2092:16a-3: de yang nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i ye shes las kyang /
T02D2092:16a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes khyad par che ste /
T02D2092:16a-5: de las kyang khyad par du gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas /
T02D2092:16a-6: yod pa zhes bya ba ji snyed pa dang /
T02D2092:16a-7: med pa zhes bya ba ji lta ba shes pa ste /
T02D2092:16a-8: de ltar tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas ni tshogs bsags pa las 'byung bar bstan pa'o //
T02D2092:16a-9: tshogs bsags pa las sangs rgyas kyi sku ji ltar 'byung zhe na //
T02D2092:16a-10: rtag ba kun rgyal rnal 'byor can //
T02D2092:16a-11: bsam gtan bsam bya blo ldan mchog / so sor rang rig spyod yul ba //
T02D2092:16a-12: chog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang //
T02D2092:16a-13: zhes pa la sogs pa smros te /
T02D2092:16a-14: don dam chos kyi sku mi 'gyur ba de rnam rtog gi sgra las rgyal zhing /
T02D2092:16a-15: thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel bas rnal 'byor te /
T02D2092:16a-17: thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa //
T02D2092:16a-18: rnal 'byor zhes su brjod pa yin //
T02D2092:16a-20: rnam par mi rtog pa'i snying bo la rnam pa rtog pa mi g-yo bas bsam gtan /
T02D2092:16a-21: de sangs rgyas don du gnyer ba rnams kyis bsam par bya ba'i 'os yin pas bsam bya //
T02D2092:16a-22: gnyis med rtogs pas blo dang ldan pa'i mchog go //
T02D2092:16a-24: chos spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid ma 'dres par so sor rang gis rig pa'o //
T02D2092:16a-25: de la ma zhen pa ni mi g-yo ba'o //
T02D2092:16a-26: de lta bu ni sku thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa ste /
T02D2092:16a-27: sku'i bye brag gzhan 'byung ba'i dngos po la de thob dgos pas dang po //
T02D2092:16a-28: de'i yon tan gyi khyad par sku gsum du snang ba'o //
T02D2092:16a-29: de las sku dang ye shes kyi bye brag ji ltar 'byung zhe na //
T02D2092:16a-30: sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can / khyab bdag
T02D2092:16a-31: ye shes lnga yi bdag / sangs rgyas lnga bdag
T02D2092:16a-32: cod pan can // spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chad //
T02D2092:16a-33: sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa po //
T02D2092:16a-34: sangs rgyas sras po dam pa'i mchog / ces smos te /
T02D2092:16a-35: sku lnga ni chos kyi sku dang /
T02D2092:16a-36: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T02D2092:16a-38: rdo rje lta bu'i sku dang /
T02D2092:16a-39: mngon par byang chub pa'i sku'o //
T02D2092:16a-40: khyab bdag ni chos kyi dbyings kyis snod bcud kun la khyab pa'o //
T02D2092:16b-0: @16b ye shes lnga ni slad du bshad zin to //
T02D2092:16b-1: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lnga'o //
T02D2092:16b-2: ye shes lnga las sangs rgyas lngas brgyan pa cod pan can zhes bya'o //
T02D2092:16b-3: spyan lnga ni sha'i spyan dang /
T02D2092:16b-8: de rnams la thogs chags med pas mnga' ba'o //
T02D2092:16b-9: byang chub kyi sems de kho na nyid rtogs nas
T02D2092:16b-10: sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i yum du 'gyur zhing
T02D2092:16b-11: / sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi sras so //
T02D2092:16b-12: 'o na nyan thos rnams sras dam pa min pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2092:16b-14: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la sras stong yod kyang /
T02D2092:16b-15: mtshan dang ldan pa gcig sras kyi dam par 'dzin pa de bzhin du /
T02D2092:16b-16: nyan thos dang rang rgyal shes rab dang snying rje
T02D2092:16b-17: chung bas sangs rgyas kyi rigs 'dzin cing mdzad pa
T02D2092:16b-18: sgrub mi nus pas sras kyi dam pa ma yin
T02D2092:16b-19: no // byang chub sems dpa' ni snying rje dang
T02D2092:16b-20: shes rab che bas sangs rgyas kyi rigs 'dzin cing
T02D2092:16b-21: mdzad pa sgrub pas sras po dam pa'o //
T02D2092:16b-22: gnas skabs su byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs su rje
T02D2092:16b-23: btsun nyid bzhugs nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas de
T02D2092:16b-24: skad ces bya'o // de'i mdzad pa ci zhe na /
T02D2092:16b-25: shes pa srid 'byung skye gnas med //
T02D2092:16b-26: chos las byung ba srid pa sel //
T02D2092:16b-27: gcig tu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag / skyes ma thag tu 'gro ba'i bdag / ces smos te /
T02D2092:16b-28: de kho na shes pas srid pa las 'byung ste /
T02D2092:16b-29: 'khor bar skye ba'i gnas med do //
T02D2092:16b-30: chos kyi sku rtogs pa las ye shes 'byung ste /
T02D2092:16b-31: de srid pa'i rgyu las dang nyon mongs pa sel lo //
T02D2092:16b-32: gang gis sel na ye shes drug ro gcig pa /
T02D2092:16b-34: dbyer med pa des sel lo //
T02D2092:16b-35: dus nam sel na skyes ma thag tu'o //
T02D2092:16b-36: ye shes lnga'i tshul gyis gzhan gyis ma rig pa ji ltar sel na //
T02D2092:16b-37: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
T02D2092:16b-38: shes rab ye shes ma'i che //
T02D2092:16b-39: 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed //
T02D2092:16b-40: ye shes skar ma lam me ba //
T02D2092:16b-41: 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron //
T02D2092:16b-43: chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' dang dra ba las yon
T02D2092:16b-44: tan 'gag pa med pa 'byung bas chos kyi dbyings
T02D2092:16b-46: de'i don shes rab dam ba rtogs te /
T02D2092:17a-0: gsal la rtog pa med pa'i ye @17a * //
T02D2092:17a-2: me yis rtsi sdur bsreg pa lta bu ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
T02D2092:17a-3: chos thams cad mnyam par rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D2092:17a-4: 'od chen po 'bar bas gdul bya la che ba'i
T02D2092:17a-5: yon tan sna tshogs snang bar byed pas mnyam pa
T02D2092:17a-8: pa'i ye shes sprin med pa'i nam mkha' la skar
T02D2092:17a-9: ma'i tshogs ma 'dres par gsal ba ltar chos thams
T02D2092:17a-10: cad kyi mtshan nyid ma 'dres par rtogs pas so
T02D2092:17a-11: sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02D2092:17a-12: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes mar me lta bus 'gro ba'i ma rig pa'i mun pa sel zhing /
T02D2092:17a-13: 'dod pa'i don yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
T02D2092:17a-14: khyad par gsang sngags kyi sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2092:17a-15: gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba //
T02D2092:17a-16: sngags mchog mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal //
T02D2092:17a-17: gsang sngags rgyal bo don chen byed //
T02D2092:17a-18: gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsug / ces smos te /
T02D2092:17a-19: gzhan zil gyis gnon pa'i gzi brjid kyi phung po chen po mnga' zhing /

T02D2092:17a-21: sngags kyi mchog tu gyur pas gsang sngags rig sngags yin la de'i mnga' bdag go //
T02D2092:17a-22: rig sngags kyi rgyal po ni shes rab dang ye shes yin la /
T02D2092:17a-23: gsang sngags kyi rgyal po ni thabs dang shes rab khyad par can yin pas /
T02D2092:17a-24: skal ba dad skal bar ldan pa la de gnyis kyi sgo nas don byed pa'o //
T02D2092:17a-25: de ni rmad du byung ba'i chos yin pas gtsug
T02D2092:17a-26: tor ltar kun gyi sbyi gtsug tu bkur bar 'os
T02D2092:17a-27: pa'o // de tsam du ma zad de 'khrul ba sna tshogs su 'byung ba ni /
T02D2092:17a-28: nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston //
T02D2092:17a-29: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku yi mchog /'gro kun dga' ba'i mig dang ldan //
T02D2092:17a-30: sna tshogs gzugs can skyed pa po //
T02D2092:17a-32: zab pa rang gi don nam mkha' lta bu las
T02D2092:17a-33: rgya che ba gzhan gyi don sna tshogs ston pa'o
T02D2092:17a-34: // sku'i mchog tu gyur pa ni drug por gcig
T02D2092:17a-35: pa'o / des 'gro ba'i don la gzigs te ji
T02D2092:17a-36: ltar dga' ba'i gzugs sna tshogs su sprul nas don
T02D2092:17a-37: // mdzad pa'o // mngor na byang chub kyi sems sna tshogs su sprul nas don mdzad pa'o //
T02D2092:17a-38: mdor na byang chub kyi sems gzugs sna tshogs su shar bar ston to //
T02D2092:17b-0: @17b de nyid don dang ldan pas gzhan gyis bkur ba'i 'os su gyur ba'i phyir //
T02D2092:17b-1: drang srong che dgus mchod cing brjod //
T02D2092:17b-3: dam tshig chen po gsang sngags 'dzin //
T02D2092:17b-4: gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa //
T02D2092:17b-6: drang srong ni spyir rig pa sgrub pa rnams la bya /
T02D2092:17b-7: drang srong chen po ni bcom ldan 'das te rang yang drang po'i lam du zhugs pa la /
T02D2092:17b-8: gzhan yang drang po'i lam du song ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2092:17b-9: des yang rje btsun nyid la mchod pa dang /
T02D2092:17b-10: yon tan brjod cing bstod pa'i gnas su gyur pa'o //
T02D2092:17b-12: sku de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /
T02D2092:17b-14: thugs rdo rje'i rigs gsum 'chang zhing thabs dang shes rab khyad par can 'chang bas na /
T02D2092:17b-17: dam tshig chen po gsang sngags kyi sgo nas gdul bya rjes su 'dzin te /
T02D2092:17b-18: rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems te chos thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pas gtso bo'o //
T02D2092:17b-19: des dkon mchog gsum gyi tshul 'dzin cing /
T02D2092:17b-20: gzhan yang 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad do //
T02D2092:17b-21: de yang rgya che ba'i dkon mchog ni spyi dang mthun /
T02D2092:17b-22: zab pa'i dbang du byas nas byang chub kyi sems
T02D2092:17b-23: gnyis su med pas sangs rgyas dkon mchog / de'i
T02D2092:17b-24: don rtogs pa ni chos dkon mchog go //
T02D2092:17b-25: rjes su sgrub pa ni dge 'dun dkon mchog go //
T02D2092:17b-26: chos kyi sgo mo ji snyed pa yang theg pa gsum du 'dus te /
T02D2092:17b-27: gdul bya rjes su gzung ba'i phyir //
T02D2092:17b-28: theg pa mchog gsum ston pa'o //
T02D2092:17b-29: don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal //
T02D2092:17b-30: 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhags //
T02D2092:17b-31: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
T02D2092:17b-35: theg pa chen po gsum gang zag gi blo dang
T02D2092:17b-36: sbyar nas gang mos pa la ston par byed de
T02D2092:17b-37: / des 'gro ba'i don yod par mdzad do //
T02D2092:17b-38: 'khor ba las rgyal bar byed do //
T02D2092:17b-39: thugs rje'i zhags pas gdul bya rjes su 'dzin pas de yang rgyu ci las 'byung na /
T02D2092:17b-40: chos kyi sku rdo rje lta bu rtogs pa las 'byung ngo //
T02D2092:17b-42: stong nyid chos skur rtogs pa'i rtags //
T02D2092:17b-43: byams dang snying rjes rab tu 'phel //
T02D2092:18a-0: thugs rjes gdul bya rjes su 'dzin pas @18a * //
T02D2092:18a-2: nyon mongs pa rnams 'ching bas zhags pa dang 'dra /
T02D2092:18a-3: de nyid la yang ma zhen pas che zhes bya'o //
T02D2092:18a-4: da ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi sgo
T02D2092:18a-5: nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan bstan pa'i
T02D2092:18a-6: phyir / rdo rje 'dzin byed 'jigs par byed //
T02D2092:18a-7: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2092:18a-8: 'dir khro bo gshin rje gshed kyi ming bstan te /
T02D2092:18a-9: de yang rdo rje'i rigs yin pas rdo rje'o //
T02D2092:18a-10: shin tu 'jigs par byed pa'i cha byad du bstan nas /
T02D2092:18a-11: ma h'a de ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D2092:18a-12: las kyi gshin rje rnams zhi bas mi 'dul ba
T02D2092:18a-13: de dag 'jigs shing skrag par byed pas 'dul ba'o
T02D2092:18a-14: ; / khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs //
T02D2092:18a-15: mig drug lag drug stobs dang ldan //
T02D2092:18a-16: keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po //
T02D2092:18a-17: zhes pa 'dis yon tan rtags kyi phyag rgya bstan te /
T02D2092:18a-18: khro bo ni gsod pa dang skrod pa la sogs pa drag po'i cha byad du ston te /
T02D2092:18a-20: gso dang skrod dang drag por ston ;
T02D2092:18a-21: /'di ni khro bo'i don du brjod //
T02D2092:18a-23: de'i nang du me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis
T02D2092:18a-24: nyon mongs pa zhe sdang la sogs pa bcom pa'i
T02D2092:18a-25: rtags so // de ni khro bo rnams kyi nang na gtso bor gyur pas rgyal po'o //
T02D2092:18a-26: de yang rigs drug dang ldan pa'i rtags so //
T02D2092:18a-27: de ni khro bo rnams kyi nang na gtso bor gyur pas rgyal po'o //
T02D2092:18a-28: de yang rig drug dang ldan pa'i rtags su gdong drug go //
T02D2092:18a-29: ye shes drug dang ldan pa'i rtags su mig drug go //
T02D2092:18a-30: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i rtags su lag pa drug go //
T02D2092:18a-31: gdug pa 'joms par byed pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2092:18a-32: mi mgo skam rlon gyis brgyan pas keng rus so //
T02D2092:18a-33: nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab rnon pos nyon mongs pa 'joms shing /
T02D2092:18a-34: gdug pa can 'dul ba'i rtags su mche ba gcig pa'o //
T02D2092:18a-35: ha la ha la gdong brgya pa //
T02D2092:18a-36: zhes pa 'dis 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyan bstan te /
T02D2092:18a-38: dug bzhi dang ldan pa'i sprul gyis lus dang yan lag brgyan pa'o //
T02D2092:18a-39: gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal //
T02D2092:18a-40: rdo rje shugs can 'jigs byed pa //
T02D2092:18a-41: zhes pa 'dis ni sku'i phrin las bstan te /
T02D2092:18a-42: 'di las kyi gshin rje rnams 'dul ba'i gshed du gyur pa ste /
T02D2092:18a-43: bgegs kyi rgyal po byin ya ka dang /
T02D2092:18a-44: tshogs bdag glang sna la sogs pa rnams 'dul bar byed pas rgyal po'o //

T02D2092:18b-1: mdzad pa'i shugs chen po dang ldan pa'i sgo nas

T02D2092:18b-3: // rdo rje'i grags pa'i khyad par ji tsam zhe na //
T02D2092:18b-4: rdo rje grags pa rdo rje snying //
T02D2092:18b-6: chos thams cad rdo rje ltar dbyer mi phyed cing /
T02D2092:18b-7: 'jig rten gsum du grags pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'o//
T02D2092:18b-8: dbyer mi phyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste /
T02D2092:18b-9: chos thams cad kyi 'phro bar gyur pa'i gzhir gyur pas kyang snying po /
T02D2092:18b-10: rdo rje lta bu thugs kyi rigs yin pas kyang rdo rje'i snying /

T02D2092:18b-13: sgyu 'phrul rdo rje gsus po che //
T02D2092:18b-15: sgyu ma lta bu'i sprul pa sna tshogs su sprul zhing /
T02D2092:18b-16: rdo rje lta bu'i sku de yang nang du che
T02D2092:18b-17: ba'i yon tan thams cad kyis gang ba'i rtags su
T02D2092:18b-20: rdo rje las skyes rdo rje'i bdag / ces pa smos te /
T02D2092:18b-21: de'i rgyu ni chos sku rdo rje lta bu rtogs pa las skyes te /
T02D2092:18b-22: rigs thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pas bdag po'o //
T02D2092:18b-24: rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra ba //
T02D2092:18b-28: cho 'phrul mi 'gag pa'i phyir nam mkha'o //
T02D2092:18b-29: 'o na mtshan ma can du mi 'gyur ram zhe na //
T02D2092:18b-30: mi g-yo ral pa gcig gis bsgyings //
T02D2092:18b-31: glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon //

T02D2092:18b-34: theg pa mchog dang ldan pa'i rtags su glang po che'i ko rlon gos su gyon pa'o //
T02D2092:18b-35: khro bo'i gsung ji lta bu zhe na //
T02D2092:18b-36: drag chen ha ha zhes sgrogs pa //
T02D2092:18b-37: hi hi zhes sgrogs 'jigs bar byed //
T02D2092:18b-38: gad mo chen mo gang rgyangs can //
T02D2092:18b-39: rdo rje gad mo cher sgrogs pa //
T02D2092:18b-41: 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa la dgyes pas ha ha zhes pa'i sgra sgrogs shing /

T02D2092:18b-43: shing brgyal bar byed pa'i gad mo che bar sgrogs

T02D2092:18b-46: te / / 'jig rten gsum na thos par sgrogs pa'o //
T02D2092:18b-47: 'o na thugs kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu lags she na /
T02D2092:18b-48: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02D2092:19a-2: rdo rje drag po dga' ba che //
T02D2092:19a-3: rdo rje h'um ste h'um zhes sgrogs //
T02D2092:19a-5: rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i thugs ye shes chen po /
T02D2092:19a-6: chos kyi dbyings la sems pa dang /
T02D2092:19a-7: thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don la sems pa'o //
T02D2092:19a-8: de'i gong na gzhan med pas rgyal po'o //
T02D2092:19a-9: thag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po mnga' zhing /
T02D2092:19a-10: gdug pa can 'joms pa'i thugs mnga' bas drag po'o //
T02D2092:19a-11: des sems can rnams kyi dga' ba chen po skyed par mdzad do //
T02D2092:19a-12: rdo rje lta bu thugs su chud pa'i sbo nas /
T02D2092:19a-13: h'um h'um zhes pa'i sgra bsgrags nas /
T02D2092:19a-14: gdug pa can tshar gcod par mdzad do ;
T02D2092:19a-15: / khro bo de las ci mdzad ce na /
T02D2092:19a-16: mtshon du rdo rje mda' thogs pa //
T02D2092:19a-17: rdo rje ral gris ma lus gcod //
T02D2092:19a-18: rdo rje kun 'chang rdo rje can //
T02D2092:19a-19: rdo rje gcig bu g-yul sel ba //
T02D2092:19a-21: phyag mtshan rdo rje ltar nyon mongs pa 'bigs pa'i thabs shes rab kyi mda' gzhu dang /

T02D2092:19a-23: shes rab kyi ral gri thogs pa dang /

T02D2092:19a-25: rdo rje ltar gzhan 'joms par byed pa'i mthu dang ldan pas rdo rje can zhes bya'o //
T02D2092:19a-26: de yang rdo rje lta bu gnyis su med pa'i
T02D2092:19a-27: ye shes kyis bdud bzhi dang gdug pa can 'joms
T02D2092:19a-28: shing g-yul do zlog par byed do //
T02D2092:19a-29: rgyan gyi sgo nas khyad par gyi yon tan bstan pa ni //
T02D2092:19a-30: rdo rje 'bar ba mig mi bzad //
T02D2092:19a-31: sgra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste //
T02D2092:19a-33: mig brgya ba ste rdo rje'i mig / lus ni rdo rje'i ba spu can //
T02D2092:19a-34: rdo rje'i spu ni gcig pu lus //
T02D2092:19a-35: sen mo skyes ba rdo rje rtse //
T02D2092:19a-36: rdo rje snying po pags pa mkhregs //
T02D2092:19a-37: rdo rje phreng thogs dpal dang ldan //
T02D2092:19a-38: rdo rje rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste //
T02D2092:19a-40: rdo rje 'bar ba lta bu'i drag po'i spyan shin
T02D2092:19a-41: tu mi bzad par 'jigs pa mnga' zhing dbu skra
T02D2092:19a-43: gzhan gyi rgyud la yang sku gsung thugs rdo rje
T02D2092:19a-44: lta bu'i ye shes 'bebs par mdzad la mig brgya
T02D2092:19a-45: pa zhes pa ni mtshon pa tsam ste /
T02D2092:19a-46: thams cad du ma 'gags pa shes rab kyi spyan dbyer mi phyed ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2092:19a-47: lus la rdo rje'i ba spu dngos su 'khyil ba mnga' zhing /
T02D2092:19a-48: rdo rje'i spu de gnyis su med pa'i lus la brgyan pa'o //
T02D2092:19b-0: gdug pa can @19b 'dul ba'i rtags dang /
T02D2092:19b-1: rigs lnga ye shes lnga dbyer mi phyed pa'i rtags su sor mo'i rtse mor rdo rje skyes pa'o //
T02D2092:19b-2: thams cad gnyis med du bsdus pa'i rtags su /
T02D2092:19b-3: rdo rje'i pags pa sra la 'thas pa mnga' ba'o //
T02D2092:19b-4: rdo rje'i phreng ba thogs nas gzhan don mdzad pas dpal dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2092:19b-5: che ba'i yon tan phreng ba brgyus pa ltar rgyun mi 'chad pa dang ldan pa'i rtags so //
T02D2092:19b-6: de ltar khyad par gyi rgyan rdo rjes brgyan pa'i
T02D2092:19b-7: sgo nas che ba'i yon tan rnams bstan pa yin
T02D2092:19b-8: te // thugs rdo rje'i rigs yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2092:19b-9: 'o na gsung gi sgo nas 'gro ba 'dren pa'i yon tan gang zhe na /
T02D2092:19b-10: gad rgyangs ha ha nges par sgrogs //
T02D2092:19b-11: yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra //
T02D2092:19b-12: 'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba //
T02D2092:19b-13: 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig pa //
T02D2092:19b-14: nam mkha'i mtha' la sgra sgrogs pa //
T02D2092:19b-15: sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog / ces smos te /
T02D2092:19b-16: 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa la dgyes pa'i sgra ha ha zhes sgrogs shing /
T02D2092:19b-17: yi ge drug pa ni rgyas par yi ge drug pa'i sngags /
T02D2092:19b-18: de las bsdu na b'a g'i shva ri'i 'bru drug pa'o //
T02D2092:19b-19: de gnyis ni gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa'i sgra'o //
T02D2092:19b-20: las 'phro can rnams la snyan cing yid du 'ong bas 'jam dbyangs so //
T02D2092:19b-21: don chen po ston pa'i sgra yin pas che bas so //
T02D2092:19b-22: de gang du sgrogs ni 'jig rten gsum du'o //
T02D2092:19b-23: gnyis med ston pa'i sgra yin pas gcig go //
T02D2092:19b-24: yang ji snyed cig bsgrags kyang 'gro ba 'dren par gcig pa'o //
T02D2092:19b-25: sgra de la 'gren zla med pas kyang sgra gcig pa'o //
T02D2092:19b-26: de ji tsam du sgrogs she na /
T02D2092:19b-27: nam mkha' khyab par sgrogs pa'o //
T02D2092:19b-28: sgra rnams kyi nang na chos kyi sgra 'di mchog
T02D2092:19b-29: tu gyur pa ste don chen po la sbyor ba'i
T02D2092:19b-30: phyir ro // so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D2092:19b-31: sgo nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan bstan
T02D2092:19b-32: phyir ro // pa'i phyir // yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
T02D2092:19b-33: yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med //
T02D2092:19b-34: ces pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2092:19b-35: de la gsung gi rgyu ni yang dag pa bdag med de bzhin nyid do //
T02D2092:19b-37: stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste //
T02D2092:19b-38: zab cing rgya che sgra sgrogs pa //
T02D2092:19b-39: chos kyi dung ste sgra chen ldan //
T02D2092:19b-40: chos kyi gand'i sgra bo che //
T02D2092:19b-42: phyogs bcu chos kyi rnga bo che //
T02D2092:20a-1: thams cad stong pa nyid du smra ba ni smra
T02D2092:20a-2: ba thams cad kyi gtso bo yin pas khyu mchog
T02D2092:20a-4: glang po che'i phru gu pha ma shi nas seng
T02D2092:20a-5: ges nu ma bsnun nas gsos pa la khyu mchog
T02D2092:20a-6: zer te / des khyus 'gro zil gyis gnon te de dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2092:20a-8: zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2092:20a-10: chos kyi dung lta bu'i sgra chen pos bdud btul nas /
T02D2092:20a-11: chos kyi gand'i lta bu'i sgra chen pos 'khor bsdus nas /
T02D2092:20a-12: mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos ston pa ste /

T02D2092:20a-14: snying rjes zhil mi gnas shing //
T02D2092:20a-16: rgya ji tsam che zhe na /
T02D2092:20a-17: phyogs bcu thams cad du khyab par byed pa'o //
T02D2092:20a-19: chos kyi sgra chen po rnga bo che dang 'dra ba sgrogs pa'o //
T02D2092:20a-20: de la kun 'byung ba'i gzhi gang zhe na /
T02D2092:20a-21: gzugs med gzugs bzang dam pa sta //
T02D2092:20a-22: sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes //
T02D2092:20a-23: gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal //
T02D2092:20a-24: gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po //
T02D2092:20a-26: chos sku la ngo bo nyid ma grub pas gzugs med pa'o //
T02D2092:20a-27: de'i byin gyi rlabs las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa /

T02D2092:20a-30: yang sprul sku sna tshogs gzugs can gyi yid la ji ltar 'dod pa ltar skyes zhes bshad do //
T02D2092:20a-31: rje btsun de nyid nyan thos dang /
T02D2092:20a-35: khyab 'jug la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan ma lus par snang nas don mdzad pa'o //
T02D2092:20a-36: sku de'i che ba ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2092:20a-37: mtshungs pa med cing che bar grags //
T02D2092:20a-38: khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste /
T02D2092:20a-39: 'phags lam shin tu mtho la gnas //
T02D2092:20a-40: dar ba chen po chos kyi tog / ces smos te /
T02D2092:20a-41: tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbang gis gnyen po gang gis kyang mi tshugs te /
T02D2092:20a-42: bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa gang gis kyang
T02D2092:20a-43: zil gyis mi non pas na che bar grags so
T02D2092:20b-0: // de yang @20b 'phags pa'i lam las mtho bar
T02D2092:20b-1: gyur pas gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la gnas
T02D2092:20b-2: // pa'o // chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong mkhyen pas dar ba chen po'i chos so //
T02D2092:20b-3: gnyis su med pa ni rab rtse mo'i tog ces bya'o //
T02D2092:20b-4: de gdul bya la ji ltar mos par snang ba ni /
T02D2092:20b-5: 'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig / gnas brtan
T02D2092:20b-6: rgan po skye dgu'i bdag / sum cu rtsa gnyis
T02D2092:20b-7: mtshan 'tshang ba // sdu gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes //
T02D2092:20b-9: byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba rnams la bgres rgud
T02D2092:20b-10: mi mnga' ste rtag tu byis pa lo brgyad lon
T02D2092:20b-11: pa lta bu gzhan gyi yid 'phrog par byed pa
T02D2092:20b-13: nyan thos kyis 'dul ba rnams la gnas brtan rab 'byor lta bur sprul /
T02D2092:20b-14: rang rgyal bas 'dul ba rnams la rang rgyal rgan po rdzu 'phrul cher ston pa lta bur sprul /
T02D2092:20b-15: sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba la skyed dgu'i bdag por sprul nas don mdzad de /
T02D2092:20b-16: de la skye ba dgu ni nyan thos dang /
T02D2092:20b-18: theg pa chen po dang gsum /
T02D2092:20b-19: de'i khar 'gro ba rigs drug gi gnas su sprul sku thub pa drug gis don mdzad pa dang /
T02D2092:20b-21: de la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ni thun mong du bstan to //
T02D2092:20b-22: phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa nyid dang /
T02D2092:20b-23: zhabs rus sbal bzhin du gnas pa dang /
T02D2092:20b-24: phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo 'brel ba dang /
T02D2092:20b-25: phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang /
T02D2092:20b-27: phyag gi sor mo ring ba dang /
T02D2092:20b-29: sku che zhing drang ba dang /
T02D2092:20b-31: sku'i spu gyen du 'khyil ba dang /
T02D2092:20b-32: byin pa ri dags ae na ya lta bu dang /
T02D2092:20b-33: phyag ring zhing mdzes pa dang /
T02D2092:20b-34: mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang /
T02D2092:20b-35: sku mdog gser lta bu dang /
T02D2092:20b-37: spu re re nas g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang /
T02D2092:20b-38: zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang /
T02D2092:20b-39: ro stod seng ge 'dra ba dang /
T02D2092:20b-42: ro bro ba'i mchog mkhyen pa dang /
T02D2092:20b-43: shing n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang /
T02D2092:20b-44: dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2092:20b-46: gsung tshangs pa'i dbyangs lta bu dang /
T02D2092:21a-2: tshoms bzhi bcu mda' ba dang /
T02D2092:21a-3: spyan mthon mthing du gnas pa dang /
T02D2092:21a-4: spyan rdzi ba'i rdi ma lta bu'o //
T02D2092:21a-5: khyad par gyi dbang du byas na /
T02D2092:21a-6: dpal rnam par snang mdzad la rgyu'i sems dpa' bcu
T02D2092:21a-7: drug 'bras bu'i sems dba' bcu drug gis brgyan pa
T02D2092:21a-8: la bshad do // de ltar 'jig rten gsum na shin tu sdug cing yid du 'ong la /
T02D2092:21a-9: blta bas cho ga mi shes pa 'dun pa skyes bu'i gnas su gyur pa'o //
T02D2092:21a-10: des 'jig rten pa ji ltar skyob ce na //
T02D2092:21a-11: 'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te //
T02D2092:21a-13: mgon skyob 'jig rten yid gcugs pa //
T02D2092:21a-14: skyabs dang skyob pa bla na med //
T02D2092:21a-16: 'jig rten pa'i sman dang bzo la sogs pa yang rje btsun nyid kyis bslabs pa yin la /
T02D2092:21a-17: log pa'i lam las zlog cing dam pa'i lam ston pa'i slob dpon yang mdzad do//
T02D2092:21a-18: tha snyad kyi rigs pa dang ldan pas gzhan gyis
T02D2092:21a-19: brtsad bcad kyang 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba med
T02D2092:21a-21: ji ltar yid dang mthun par sngar gyi yang skyobs mdzad la /
T02D2092:21a-22: phyis kyang skyob ste bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed do //
T02D2092:21a-23: 'o na thugs kyi mkhyen ci mnga' zhe na /
T02D2092:21a-24: nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod pa //
T02D2092:21a-25: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtsho //
T02D2092:21a-27: chos kyi sku nam mkha'i mtha' lta bu la longs
T02D2092:21a-28: spyod cing rtogs pas shes bya ji lta ba dang
T02D2092:21a-29: ji snyed pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes che
T02D2092:21a-30: ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu mda' ba'o //
T02D2092:21a-31: de'i byed pa'i las gang zhe na /
T02D2092:21a-32: ma rig sgo nga'i spubs 'byed pa //
T02D2092:21a-33: srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po //
T02D2092:21a-34: nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa //
T02D2092:21a-35: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin //
T02D2092:21a-37: gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs pas ma rig sgo
T02D2092:21a-38: nga'i shun lpags 'dra ba sbubs phye nas srid pa'i
T02D2092:21a-39: dra ba las dang nyon mongs pa dang 'brel ba
T02D2092:21a-40: rnams bcom ste / nyon mongs pa rtsa ba lnga'am drug dang /
T02D2092:21a-41: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa nyi shu po dang /
T02D2092:21a-42: kun nas nyon mongs pa ste brgya dang gsum lta
T02D2092:21a-43: bu zhi nas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin
T02D2092:21a-44: pa'o // de rtogs pa'i phan yon ni //
T02D2092:21b-0: ye shes dbang bskur cod pan @21b can ;
T02D2092:21b-1: / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs //
T02D2092:21b-2: sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi //
T02D2092:21b-3: gsum sel mtha' yas grol gsum thob //
T02D2092:21b-4: sgrib pa kun las des par grol //
T02D2092:21b-5: mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas //
T02D2092:21b-6: nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das //
T02D2092:21b-8: gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs pas nyon mongs pa lnga ma spangs rang sar grol te /
T02D2092:21b-9: ye shes lngar snang ba ste /
T02D2092:21b-10: bum pa la sogs pa'i dbang la ltos pa ma yin te /
T02D2092:21b-11: ye shes gcig rdzogs kyi dbang zhes bya'o //
T02D2092:21b-12: bzhi rig pa gcig la snang tshul ye shes kyis
T02D2092:21b-13: brgyan pa de shin tu mdzes pa'i phyir cod pan
T02D2092:21b-15: sems kyis chos la dbang thob na //
T02D2092:21b-16: rdzas tshig mtshan ma'i dbang rnams kun //
T02D2092:21b-17: ma bskur kyang ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D2092:21b-19: ye shes lnga'i gzugs brnyan sangs rgyas lngar shar te /
T02D2092:21b-20: gsal zhing mdzes pa'i phyir rgyan zhes bya'o //
T02D2092:21b-22: de ltar rtog pas sdug bsngal gya sdug bsngal dang /
T02D2092:21b-24: 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang gsum zhi la /
T02D2092:21b-25: nyon mongs pa rnams kyang dug gsum du 'dus ta /
T02D2092:21b-27: de gsum bsal nas 'gro ba mtha' yas pa'i don byas nas /
T02D2092:21b-30: byang chub sems dpa' dang gsum thob par byed do //
T02D2092:21b-31: khyad par du sku gsum la bya'o //
T02D2092:21b-32: de yang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
T02D2092:21b-33: shes bya'i sgrib pa kun las grol nas /
T02D2092:21b-34: nam mkha' lta bu'i mnyam pa nyid la gnas te /
T02D2092:21b-35: de phan tshod nyon mongs pa'i dri ma las 'das pa'o //
T02D2092:21b-36: de ltar rtogs pa'i ngo bo ci zhe na //
T02D2092:21b-37: dus gsum dus med rtog pa po //
T02D2092:21b-38: sems can kun gyi gtso bo che //

T02D2092:21b-46: da ltar de bzhin nyid 'di thams cad bye brag med //
T02D2092:21b-48: de ltar rtogs pa ni sems can kun las ches khyad par 'phags pas gtso bo che'o //
T02D2092:22a-2: de las kyang rang rgyal ba /
T02D2092:22a-3: de las kyang byang chub sems dpa'/

T02D2092:22a-6: de las kyang thod ltar mdzes shing rab tu gyur pa ni be tsu tsun nyid do //
T02D2092:22a-7: de ltar 'gro ba'i lus kun du skye ba grol
T02D2092:22a-8: nas nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes la gnas so
T02D2092:22a-9: // 'o na 'gro ba'i don ji ltar mdzad na /
T02D2092:22a-10: yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang //
T02D2092:22a-11: khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi bdag / dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste //
T02D2092:22a-12: bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog / byed pa sems can kun don byed //
T02D2092:22a-13: phan 'dogs sems can mnyes gshin pa //
T02D2092:22a-15: gzhan don 'byung ba'i dpe yid bzhin nor bu la yang chos brgyad de /
T02D2092:22a-16: sems can gyi dgos 'dod 'byung ba dang /
T02D2092:22a-17: de yang gsol ba ma btab na mi 'byung ba dang btab na 'byung ba dang /
T02D2092:22a-20: zad mi shes par 'byung ba dang /
T02D2092:22a-21: rtog pa med par 'byung ba dang /
T02D2092:22a-22: phyis lan la re ba med pa'o //
T02D2092:22a-23: de dang 'dra ba'i yon tan rin po che lta bu des kun la khyab pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02D2092:22a-24: yang dpag bsam shing dang 'dra ste ;
T02D2092:22a-25: de la yang chos bcu ste /
T02D2092:22a-26: snga ma brgyad kyi khar bsil ba dang /
T02D2092:22a-27: 'gro ba ngal sos pa'i gnas su gyur pa lta bu dang bcu'o //
T02D2092:22a-28: yang bum pa bzang po bsgrub pa dang 'dra ste /
T02D2092:22a-32: ma bsgrubs na mi 'byung ba dang bcu'o //
T02D2092:22a-34: bum pa bzang po dang ni dpag bsam shing //
T02D2092:22a-35: yid bzhin nor rnams sems dang mi ldan bas //
T02D2092:22a-36: sems can rnams kyi don ni 'byung 'gyur na //
T02D2092:22a-37: thugs rje cher mnga' rgyal ba smos ci dgos //
T02D2092:22a-39: de ltar bu gcig pa'i ma ltar phan 'dogs pa'o //
T02D2092:22a-40: des gdul bya'i bsam pa ji ltar mkhyen ce na /
T02D2092:22a-41: bzang ngan shes shing dus shes la //
T02D2092:22a-42: khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan //
T02D2092:22a-43: dus shes sems can dbang don shes //
T02D2092:22a-44: rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po //
T02D2092:22a-45: yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes //
T02D2092:22b-1: de'i 'bras bu dus ji tsam na 'byung shes la /
T02D2092:22b-2: thugs rjes kun la khyab pa'i bdag po gzhan gyi tshig kyang shes la /
T02D2092:22b-3: rang yang de kho na las mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2092:22b-4: don mdzad pa'i tshe 'dul ba'i dus tshod shes shing
T02D2092:22b-5: sems can gyi dbang po rab 'bring tha ma dang
T02D2092:22b-6: / dad pa dang brtson 'grus rab 'bring tha ma'i don shes pa'o //
T02D2092:22b-7: de yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' bas /
T02D2092:22b-10: theg pa chen po dang rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa'o //
T02D2092:22b-11: sku dang ye shes stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la
T02D2092:22b-12: sogs pa'i yon tan dang rje btsun nyid kyang ldan
T02D2092:22b-14: rang rgyal ba la sogs pa'i rgyud la yod pa'i yon tan rnams kyang shes pa'o //
T02D2092:22b-15: de ltar gyur pa'i bkra shis pa'i dam par bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2092:22b-16: chos shes bkra shis bkra shis 'byung //
T02D2092:22b-17: bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa //
T02D2092:22b-18: grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge //
T02D2092:22b-19: dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che //
T02D2092:22b-20: dga' chen rol mo chen po ste //
T02D2092:22b-22: de ltar chos kyi don shes pas tshe 'dir yang
T02D2092:22b-23: legs pa'i yon tan kun 'byung pas bkra shis la
T02D2092:22b-24: / phyi mar yang legs pa'i yon tan kun 'byung bas bkra shis 'byung ngo //
T02D2092:22b-25: 'jig rten pa'i tshe ring ba dang /
T02D2092:22b-26: nor dang rigs rgyud 'phel ba la sogs pa bkra
T02D2092:22b-27: shis pa rnams kyi nang na yang bkra shis dam
T02D2092:22b-28: pa 'gyur ro // khams gsum du grags shing legs
T02D2092:22b-29: pa'i yon tan 'byung bas grags pa'i bkra shis so
T02D2092:22b-30: pa 'gyur ro // // mi dge ba las log
T02D2092:22b-31: nas dge ba sna tshogs la zhugs pas snyan grags
T02D2092:22b-33: rnams thar pa'i lam du dbugs 'byin pas kun dga'
T02D2092:22b-34: ba'i chos kyi ston mo chen po mdzad cing /
T02D2092:22b-35: zag med kyi bde ba chen po thob pas dga' chen no //
T02D2092:22b-36: 'dod pa'i yon tan mi spong bas rol mo chen po zhes bya'o //
T02D2092:22b-37: des 'gro ba skyob pa'i tshul ni /
T02D2092:22b-38: bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs //
T02D2092:22b-39: mchog tu dga' ba'i grags bdag dpal //
T02D2092:22b-40: mchog ldan mchog sbyin gtso bo ste //
T02D2092:22b-41: skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs su 'os //
T02D2092:22b-42: 'jig rten dgra ste rab kyi mchog /'jigs pa ma lus sel ba po //
T02D2092:23a-1: bya ba'i 'os ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten
T02D2092:23a-2: las 'das pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams
T02D2092:23a-3: cad kyi gter du gyur pa /
T02D2092:23a-4: mchog tu 'gro ba'i don la dga' ba /
T02D2092:23a-5: khams gsum du grags shing tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas dpal te /
T02D2092:23a-6: yon tan gyi skal pa mchog dang ldan zhing ;
T02D2092:23a-7: gzhan yang mchog ster ba'i gtso bor gyur pa'o //
T02D2092:23a-8: des sdug bsngal ba rnams 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las
T02D2092:23a-9: skyob cing de las lhag pa med pas skyabs su
T02D2092:23a-10: 'os pa'o // ci las skyob ce na /
T02D2092:23a-11: 'jig rten gyi rtog pa dgra yin te /
T02D2092:23a-13: de yang 'jig rten las rab tu gyur pas nyan thos so //
T02D2092:23a-14: de las rab tu gyur pas rang rgyal lo //
T02D2092:23a-15: de las rab tu gyur pas byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02D2092:23a-16: de dag las kyang mchog tu gyur pa rje btsun no //
T02D2092:23a-17: des bdud dang sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed pa'o //
T02D2092:23a-18: mu stegs kyi cha byad kyis 'dul ba la der sprul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i phyir /
T02D2092:23a-19: gtsug phud phud bu lcang lo can //
T02D2092:23a-20: ral pa munydza cod pan thogs //
T02D2092:23a-21: gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan //
T02D2092:23a-22: zur phud lnga pa me tog thod //
T02D2092:23a-24: gtsug phud ni skra dang kha spu bzhar bregs nas
T02D2092:23a-25: spyi bor gtsug phud tsam 'dzin pas 'dul ba der
T02D2092:23a-26: sprul lo // phud pu ni skra gzhan bregs nas dpral bar bcings pa'o //
T02D2092:23a-27: lcang lo can ni skra sil bu ring ba'o //
T02D2092:23a-28: ral pa ni ral pa sog kha non pa ni /
T02D2092:23a-29: lha chen po la dad pa rnams kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2092:23a-30: munydza ni rked sor slebs pa'i ral pa ske rags su bcings pa'o //
T02D2092:23a-31: cod pan ni dar la sogs pa thod du bcings pa'o //
T02D2092:23a-32: tha ma cod pan du 'phur ba'o //
T02D2092:23a-33: gdong lnga ni phyogs bzhin gdong pa bzhi /
T02D2092:23a-34: spyi bo'i gtsug na gcig ste lnga'o //
T02D2092:23a-35: gdong pa bzhi nas rig byed kyi sgra bzhi 'don te /
T02D2092:23a-36: shar nas nges brjod kyi rig byed /
T02D2092:23a-37: lho nas mchod brjod kyi rig byed /
T02D2092:23a-38: nub nas snyan dang gas kyi rig byed /
T02D2092:23a-39: byang nas srid srung gi rig byed 'don pa'o //
T02D2092:23a-40: de ltar tshangs pa gdong lnga pa lta bus 'dul ba der sprul lo //
T02D2092:23a-41: yang mgo la gtsug phud lnga dang ldan pa mu
T02D2092:23a-42: stegs gzegs zan gyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba la des
T02D2092:23a-43: sprul lo // yang mgo la rin po che'i zur
T02D2092:23b-0: phud lnga @23b yong pa dri za'i gzugs kyis 'dul
T02D2092:23b-2: yang mgo la me tog gi thod bcings pas gzhan
T02D2092:23b-3: 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba la
T02D2092:23b-4: der sprul lo // 'o na sangs rgyas pa'i brtul zhugs ji ltar 'dzin zhe na //
T02D2092:23b-5: mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po 'chang //
T02D2092:23b-6: tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog / dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub che //
T02D2092:23b-7: gtsang gnas dam pa goo tam //
T02D2092:23b-8: bram ze tshangs pa tshangs pa shes //
T02D2092:23b-10: sh'akya thub pa lta bu'i rab tu byung bas 'dul
T02D2092:23b-11: ba la mgo zlum du sprul nas gnod pa las
T02D2092:23b-12: zlog pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin par mdzad do //
T02D2092:23b-13: yang tshangs par spyod pa'i sdom pa la gnas shing
T02D2092:23b-14: brtul zhugs 'dzin pas 'dul ba la der ston to
T02D2092:23b-15: // sh'akya thub pa chu bo ne ra dz'a rar
T02D2092:23b-16: dka' thub mdzad pa lta bu la yang der ston
T02D2092:23b-17: // to // goo ta ma ni sh'akya'i rigs te //
T02D2092:23b-18: gtsang sbra la gnas pa rgyal rigs su sprul pa dang /
T02D2092:23b-19: rang bzhin gyis dka' thub dang ;
T02D2092:23b-20: gtsang sbra la gnas pa bram ze lta bur kyang sprul pa mdzad do //
T02D2092:23b-21: nyid la nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pas tshangs pa /
T02D2092:23b-22: gzhan skyon dang bral ba'i thabs shes pas tshangs pa shes zhes bya'o //
T02D2092:23b-23: de ltar sprul pa'i phan yon ci zhe na /
T02D2092:23b-24: mya ngan 'das pa tshangs pa thob //
T02D2092:23b-25: grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus ;
T02D2092:23b-26: / rnam grol zhi ba zhi ba nyid //
T02D2092:23b-28: legs par mya ngan 'das dang nye //
T02D2092:23b-29: bde sdug sel ba mthar gyur pa //
T02D2092:23b-31: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral bas mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02D2092:23b-32: de nyid la zhen pa dang bral bas tshangs pa thob pa'o //
T02D2092:23b-33: de ltar 'ching ba mtha' dag las grol zhing thar nas ye shes kyi sku thob ste /
T02D2092:23b-34: des yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i rten byed pas lus zhes bya'o //
T02D2092:23b-35: de ltar nyon mongs pa las grol zhing spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad zhi bas zhi ba'o //
T02D2092:23b-36: zhi ba de nyid las mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi yon tan rnams 'byung ste /
T02D2092:23b-37: mya ngan las 'das pa ni nyan thos kyi lam mo //
T02D2092:23b-38: mya ngan las 'das pa phyi ma ni rang rgyal ba'i lam mo //
T02D2092:23b-39: legs par mya ngan las 'das pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T02D2092:23b-40: bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' dang /
T02D2092:23b-41: sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i mtha' gnyis sel te /
T02D2092:24a-0: @24a * // mthar gyur pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa ni sangs rgyas nyid do //
T02D2092:24a-1: gzhi'i gnas lugs rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2092:24a-2: chags bral lus las 'das pa po //
T02D2092:24a-3: thub pa med pa dpe med pa //
T02D2092:24a-4: mi mngon mi snang gsal byed min //
T02D2092:24a-6: phra zhing zag med sa bon bral //
T02D2092:24a-7: rdul med rdul bral dri ma med //
T02D2092:24a-8: nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa //
T02D2092:24a-10: yul rnams la chags pa'i blo dang bral ba'i ye shes su snang ba las 'das te /
T02D2092:24a-11: de nyid mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi stobs kyis mi brdzi bas thub pa med do //
T02D2092:24a-12: gang dang yang mnyam pa med pas dpe med do //
T02D2092:24a-13: 'di mtshan nyid dngos po cir yang mi mthong la mtshan ma gang du yang mi snang ste /
T02D2092:24a-14: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid du gnas
T02D2092:24a-15: pas don la gsal byed mi dgos te mar me
T02D2092:24a-16: lta bu'o // 'dus ma byas pa'i rkyen gang gis kyang mi 'gyur zhing /
T02D2092:24a-17: bde gshegs kyi snying po kun grol des til 'bru la mar bzhin kun la khyab po //
T02D2092:24a-18: rtul pos mi shes pas phra zhing zag pa ste
T02D2092:24a-19: srid par skye ba'i sa bon ma rig pa bdag
T02D2092:24a-21: de ltar gzhi la rnam par rtog pa'i rdul dag nas med la /
T02D2092:24a-22: de ma rtogs pa'i blo yang de nyid /
T02D2092:24a-23: rtogs na rtogs pa'i rdul dang bral bar 'gyur la /
T02D2092:24a-24: de nyid la yang ma zhen pas dri ma med pa'o //
T02D2092:24a-25: de ltar sgrib gnyis spangs pas nyes pa'i skyon gang yang med pa'o //
T02D2092:24a-26: don gnyis su med pa lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul ni //
T02D2092:24a-27: shin tu sad ba sad pa'i bdag / kun shes kun rig dam pa po //
T02D2092:24a-28: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das //
T02D2092:24a-29: ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba //
T02D2092:24a-30: rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub //
T02D2092:24a-32: sgrib pa gnyis las sad pa'am /
T02D2092:24a-33: yang na snang ba ye shes sus sad pa'am /
T02D2092:24a-34: sems stong par sad pas ji snyed pa kun shes shing /
T02D2092:24a-36: de yang dbyer med du shes pas dam pa'o //
T02D2092:24a-37: de ltar rtog pa dang bral bas rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi klong du 'das pa'o //
T02D2092:24a-38: 'das pa tsam na gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul 'chang ba'o //
T02D2092:24a-39: rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i ye shes rgyu rkyen med par lhun gyis grub pa ste /
T02D2092:24b-0: de la yon tan @24b thams cad lhun gyis grub pas yon tan lhun grub po //
T02D2092:24b-1: rgyu rkyen gyis ji ltar ma bskyed cen /
T02D2092:24b-2: dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa //
T02D2092:24b-3: sangs rgyas thog ma tham med //
T02D2092:24b-4: dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa //
T02D2092:24b-5: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
T02D2092:24b-6: ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2092:24b-8: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis sems can 'dren pa'i las mdzad de /
T02D2092:24b-9: sangs rgyas la thog ma 'di nas byung bya ba dang /
T02D2092:24b-10: tha ma 'dir song bya ba med de dang po nyid nas rgyu med pa'o //
T02D2092:24b-11: de la gnyis 'dzin gyi dri ma med pas ye shes mig gcig go //
T02D2092:24b-12: ye shes drug ro gcig pa'i lus yin pas de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2092:24b-13: de la gsung gi khyad par ci zhe na //
T02D2092:24b-14: tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che //
T02D2092:24b-15: smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal //
T02D2092:24b-16: smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas //
T02D2092:24b-17: smra ba'i seng ge mtshungs pa med //
T02D2092:24b-19: zab cing rgya che ba'i chos gsungs pas tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che'o //
T02D2092:24b-20: mu stegs kyi smra ba las mchog tu gyur cing /
T02D2092:24b-21: nyan thos kyi smra ba zil gyis gnon pas smra ba'i rgyal lo //
T02D2092:24b-22: rang rgyal ba'i smra ba las 'phags pas dam pa'o //
T02D2092:24b-23: skye med kyi sgra chos smra ba'i gong na gzhan med pas mchog gi gnas so //
T02D2092:24b-24: de ni seng ge dang 'dra ste bdud la sogs pa'i rgol bas mi tshugs so //
T02D2092:24b-25: 'o na sku'i che ba gang zhe na //
T02D2092:24b-26: kun du lta ba mchog tu dga' //
T02D2092:24b-27: gzi brjid phung po blta na sdug /'od bzangs 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u //
T02D2092:24b-30: shes rab ldan pa'i dbang gis so //
T02D2092:24b-31: de yang dam pas 'gro ba la gzigs pas kun du lta pa'o //
T02D2092:24b-32: bde pa chen po 'phags pas mchog tu dga'o //
T02D2092:24b-33: gzi brjid chen po gzhan yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa'i sku mnga' la /
T02D2092:24b-34: nang na ye shes drug 'bar bas ma rig pa'i
T02D2092:24b-35: mun pa sel ba'i rtags phyi ru 'od kha dog
T02D2092:24b-36: drug 'bar ba'o // mtshan thun mong ma yin pa
T02D2092:24b-37: thugs ka na rin po che dpal be'us brgyan pa'o
T02D2092:24b-38: drug 'bar ba'o // // phyag las kyang 'od zer
T02D2092:24b-39: 'bar te zhi bas 'dul ba rnams 'dun pa skyed
T02D2092:24b-40: drug 'bar ba'o // // par byed la / des mi 'dul ba rnams tshar gcod par byed do //
T02D2092:24b-41: des 'gro ba'i nad ji ltar sel zhe na //
T02D2092:24b-42: sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste //
T02D2092:24b-43: zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med //
T02D2092:24b-44: sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing //
T02D2092:24b-45: nad do cog gi dgra che ba //
T02D2092:25a-2: sman pa'i mchog ste bdag med kyi don bstan nas bdag 'dzin gyi zug rngu 'byin cing /
T02D2092:25a-3: de yang sman gyi dpe ni ljon shing dang 'dra ste /
T02D2092:25a-4: rtsa ba dang yal ga dang lo 'dab dang me
T02D2092:25a-5: tog la brten nas 'bras bu 'byung ba ltar rtsa
T02D2092:25a-6: ba ni byang chub sems so //
T02D2092:25a-7: yal ga ni rtogs par byed pa'i thabs kyi yan lag rnams so //
T02D2092:25a-8: lo ma ni 'dir theg pa so so'i chos kyang bkag pa med pa'o //
T02D2092:25a-9: me tog ni rtogs pa'i nyams myong ngo //
T02D2092:25a-10: 'bras bu ni de mthar phyin pa'o //
T02D2092:25a-11: der yang ma zad de phyi nang gi sman sna tshogs su yang sprul lo //
T02D2092:25a-12: des dgra phyi nang gi nad sel bar byed do //
T02D2092:25a-13: 'o na sku'i khyad par ci zhe na /
T02D2092:25a-14: sngu gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog / dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can //

T02D2092:31b-26: las sprul sku sna tshogs pa 'gro ba'i dpal du
T02D2092:31b-27: 'byung ba ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra
T02D2092:31b-28: bar 'dod pa skor bas rab ces bya'o //
T02D2092:31b-29: co to zhes bya ba me tog ces bya'o //
T02D2092:31b-30: de yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni nges pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan te /
T02D2092:31b-36: sprul sku ni rnam pa ma nges /
T02D2092:31b-41: da ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi sgo
T02D2092:31b-42: nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan bstan par
T02D2092:31b-43: bya ste / de yang phrin las kyi rgyu gang zhe na //
T02D2092:31b-44: sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba //
T02D2092:31b-45: sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med //
T02D2092:31b-46: ces pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2092:31b-47: chos kyi sku gnyis med ni sangs rgyas kun gyi
T02D2092:31b-48: rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i chos chan po yin
T02D2092:31b-49: la / de rtogs nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med pa'o //
T02D2092:31b-50: gsang sngags las byung yi ge med //
T02D2092:32a-2: gsang sngags don kun skyed pa po //
T02D2092:32a-3: thig le chen po yi ge med //
T02D2092:32a-4: stong pa chen po yi ge lnga //
T02D2092:32a-5: thig le stong pa yi ge brgya //
T02D2092:32a-6: zhes pa thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i chos
T02D2092:32a-7: kyi ngo bo nyid brjod du med pas yi ge
T02D2092:32a-8: med pa'o // rgyu che ba thabs dang shes rab
T02D2092:32a-9: las 'bras bu che ba sku gsung thugs kyi rigs
T02D2092:32a-11: des gsang sngags kyi don bskyed rim pa dang /
T02D2092:32a-12: rdzogs rim gzhan gyi rgyud las skyed par byed pa'o //
T02D2092:32a-13: don dam par thig chos nyid mi 'gyur ba la /
T02D2092:32a-14: le khyab cing gdal ba ste /
T02D2092:32a-15: ngo bo tshig gis brjod du med pa'o ;
T02D2092:32a-16: / stong pa chen po chos kyi sku de nyid
T02D2092:32a-17: las de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sa bon yi ge
T02D2092:32a-22: // / thig le skye ba med pa de las yi ge brgya ste /
T02D2092:32a-23: de la brten nas sgrub thabs sna tshogs 'byung ba ste /
T02D2092:32a-24: don du na chos kyi sku la phyogs ris med cing 'gag pa med pa'i mthu'o //
T02D2092:32a-25: 'on thugs kyi sprul pa gang zhe na //
T02D2092:32a-26: rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med //
T02D2092:32a-27: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can //
T02D2092:32a-28: yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das //
T02D2092:32a-29: bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can //
T02D2092:32a-30: bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing //
T02D2092:32a-31: ting 'dzin rig dang rgyud rig pa //
T02D2092:32a-33: kun rdzob tu mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs te snod bcud kyi rnam pa kun dang ldan la /
T02D2092:32a-34: don dam par snang ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
T02D2092:32a-35: dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug gi phyed yi ge brgyad yin la /
T02D2092:32a-36: brgyad kyi phyed bzhi yin te /
T02D2092:32a-39: de bzhi ni mtshon byed du byung ba yin te /
T02D2092:32a-41: rnam par thar ba'i sgo bzhi mtshon te /
T02D2092:32a-42: stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa dang /
T02D2092:32a-43: mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa dang /
T02D2092:32a-44: smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa dang /
T02D2092:32a-45: thabs la mkhas pa'i rnam par thar pa'o //
T02D2092:32a-46: de yang stong pa nyid kyis ni dngos po las 'byin par byed do //
T02D2092:32a-47: mtshan ma med pas ni mtshan ma phra mo'i zhen pa las kyang 'byin par byed do //
T02D2092:32a-48: smon pa med pas ni 'bras bu re smon gyi mtha' la dmigs pa las 'byin par byed do //
T02D2092:32b-0: thabs la mkhas pas ni thabs dman zhing mi mkhas pa rnams las 'byin par byed @32b do ;
T02D2092:32b-1: / de bzhin yang spros pa phyogs re bcad pa'i yon tan gyi cha nas bzhir bshad kyis /
T02D2092:32b-2: don du na thig le chen po yi ge med pa'o //
T02D2092:32b-3: yang spyi bo bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo na
T02D2092:32b-4: byang chub kyi sems thig le cha bcu drug tu
T02D2092:32b-5: gnas te / de las kyi phyag rgya'i thabs kyi bye brag rnams la brten te /
T02D2092:32b-6: spyi bo bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i thig le
T02D2092:32b-7: bcu drug po bzhu ba'i phyed brgyad snying ga chos
T02D2092:32b-9: de bzhu ba'i phyed lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor phab /
T02D2092:32b-10: de'i phyir gsang ba bde skyong gi 'khor lor phab ste /
T02D2092:32b-11: gnyis shos gnyis mnyam gyi dus su dngos gzung ngo //
T02D2092:32b-12: de yang dang yang du goms par byas bas mthar de'i zhen pa bag tsam dang yang bral te /
T02D2092:32b-13: thig le chen po yi ge med pa rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2092:32b-15: zab mo rnam par thar pa bzhis //
T02D2092:32b-16: rnon pa'i don du bshad pa yin //
T02D2092:32b-17: 'khor lo bzhin du bskor byed pa //
T02D2092:32b-18: rtul po'i don du shes par bya //
T02D2092:32b-20: de ltar bsgoms pas rnam rtog gyi yan lag med pa /
T02D2092:32b-22: ting nge 'dzin bzang ba ni bsam gtan bzhi la lta'i ting nge 'dzin lta bu'o //
T02D2092:32b-23: nyid kyang de dang dang zhing gzhan gyi ting nge
T02D2092:32b-24: 'dzin bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams kyang shes te
T02D2092:32b-25: / de yang 'dod pa'i khams na lhag mthong shas che ba'i bsam gtan kyang shes pa'o //
T02D2092:32b-26: gzugs med pa'i khams na zhi gnas shas che ba'i bsam gtan kyang shes pa'o //
T02D2092:32b-27: gzugs kyi khams na zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel ba'i bsam gtan kyang shes te /
T02D2092:32b-28: de la bsam gtan bzhi la yan lag bco brgyad de /
T02D2092:32b-29: bsam gtan dang po la yang yan lag lnga ste /
T02D2092:32b-34: sems rtse gcig pa nyid do //
T02D2092:32b-35: bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang yan lag bzhi ste /
T02D2092:32b-38: nang rab tu dang ba dang /
T02D2092:32b-39: sems rtse gcig pa nyid do //
T02D2092:32b-40: bsam gtan gsum pa la yang yan lag lnga ste /
T02D2092:32b-45: sems rtse gcig pa nyid do //
T02D2092:32b-46: bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang yan lag bzhi ste /
T02D2092:32b-47: btang snyoms yongs su dag pa dang /
T02D2092:32b-48: dran pa yongs su dag pa dang /
T02D2092:33a-1: yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba yongs su dag pa dang /
T02D2092:33a-2: sems rtse gcig pa nyid do //
T02D2092:33a-3: de rnams rje btsun nyid kyis shes pa'o //
T02D2092:33a-4: gzhan dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D2092:33a-5: rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D2092:33a-6: seng ge rnam par bskyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ;
T02D2092:33a-7: zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge
T02D2092:33a-8: 'dzin la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin brgya rtsa gcig
T02D2092:33a-9: kyang mkhyen cing / gang zag gi bsam pa dang
T02D2092:33a-10: bag la nyal dang skye gnas kyi rgyud kyis bsdus
T02D2092:33a-11: pa rnams kyang ri gcing mkhyen no //
T02D2092:33a-12: 'o na longs sku'i mtshan pa ci zhe na /
T02D2092:33a-13: ting nge 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog / longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal //
T02D2092:33a-15: ting nge 'dzin lus can ni chos kyi sku ste /
T02D2092:33a-16: sku de gnyis kyi rten byed cing mchog tu gyur pa de ni gzhi'o //
T02D2092:33a-17: de las theg pa chen po'i chos la longs spyod pa sku rnam par snang mdzad du snang ste /
T02D2092:33a-18: de yang nges pa lnga dang ldan zhing 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lta bur bzhugs pa ste /
T02D2092:33a-20: thig chen nye bar longs spyod phyir //
T02D2092:33a-21: thub pa'i longs spyod rdzogs skur 'dod //
T02D2092:33a-23: de yang sku'i mdzad spyod rnam par dag pa'i sgo
T02D2092:33a-24: nas 'khor sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
T02D2092:33a-25: gtso bor gyur pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo
T02D2092:33a-27: de la sprul pa'i sku'i mdzad spyod ci zhe na /
T02D2092:33a-28: sprul pa'i sku ste sku yi mchog / sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba //
T02D2092:33a-29: phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed //
T02D2092:33a-30: ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
T02D2092:33a-32: de yang rgyal ba sprul pa'i sku ni /
T02D2092:33a-33: 'khor rigs drug gi sems can dang /
T02D2092:33a-35: rang rgyal ba rnams la gsung gi mdzad spyod rnam
T02D2092:33a-36: par dag pa'i sgo nas chos kyi 'khor lo skor
T02D2092:33a-37: bar mdzad de / sprul sku ma dag pa las mchog tu gyur pa sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs /
T02D2092:33a-38: gtsug tor can la sogs pa sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis kyi rgyud du sprul pa'o //
T02D2092:33a-39: sprul nas gang du 'gyed na phyogs bcur 'gyed do //
T02D2092:33a-40: bskye nas ci byed na ji ltar 'tsham pa ltar 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
T02D2092:33a-41: 'o na ma dag pa'i sprul sku gang zhe na /
T02D2092:33a-42: lha yi dbang po lha yi lha //
T02D2092:33a-43: lha yi bdag po lha min bdag /'chi med dbang po lha yi bla //
T02D2092:33b-2: lha'i dbang po ste khyab 'jug gis 'dul ba la khyab 'jug tu sprul lo /
T02D2092:33b-4: lha'i bdag po ni brgya byin no //
T02D2092:33b-5: lha min bdag ni thags bzangs ris so //
T02D2092:33b-6: 'chi med dbang po ni 'thab bral la sogs pa'i lha'i rgyal po rnams so //
T02D2092:33b-7: lha'i bla ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la sogs pa'i lha'i rgyal po'o //
T02D2092:33b-8: 'joms byed ni drag po 'jigs byed do //
T02D2092:33b-9: 'joms byed dbang phyug ni ma h'a de ba'o //
T02D2092:33b-10: de rnams kyis 'dul ba la de rnams su sprul nas don mdzad do //
T02D2092:33b-11: chos kyi sbyin pa'i tshul ni /
T02D2092:33b-12: srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal ba //
T02D2092:33b-13: ston pa gcig bu 'gro ba'i bla //
T02D2092:33b-14: 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa //
T02D2092:33b-15: chos kyi sbyin bdag che ba po //
T02D2092:33b-16: byams pa'i go cha chas pa ste //
T02D2092:33b-17: snying rje yi ni ya lad 'gos //
T02D2092:33b-18: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs //
T02D2092:33b-19: nyon mongs mi shes g-yul ngo sel //
T02D2092:33b-20: dpa' bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba //
T02D2092:33b-21: bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed //
T02D2092:33b-22: bdud kyi dpung rnams pham byed pa //
T02D2092:33b-24: srid pa ni nges pa'i 'byung gnas yin te /
T02D2092:33b-25: dgon pa ni de las dben pa'o //
T02D2092:33b-26: de las rgyal te don gnyis med rtogs pas ston pa gcig pu'o //
T02D2092:33b-27: yang na bstan pa gcig la ston pa gnyis mi 'byung bas so //
T02D2092:33b-28: 'gro ba thams cad kyi ston par gyur pas na bla ma'o //
T02D2092:33b-29: de yis 'jig rten phyogs bcur grags te /
T02D2092:33b-30: rgyu cis grags na chos kyi sbyin pas grags so //
T02D2092:33b-31: de yang rlom pa lta bu ma yin te /
T02D2092:33b-32: byams pa'i go cha go na zhing /
T02D2092:33b-34: de'i mtshon cha ni nyon mongs pa gcod pa shes rab kyi ral gri dang /
T02D2092:33b-35: thabs shes rab kyi mda' gzhus nyon mongs pa dang ma rigs pa'i g-yul ngo sel lo //
T02D2092:33b-36: gang las dpa' na bdud 'dul bas dpa'o //
T02D2092:33b-37: gzhan bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa las kyang skyob cing sel bar byad do //
T02D2092:33b-38: phyogs gcig sel ba tsam ma yin te /
T02D2092:33b-39: bdud kyi dpung sde dang bcas pa pham par byed pa ste /
T02D2092:33b-40: de yang sems skye ba med pa rtogs pas nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcom //
T02D2092:33b-41: sems nyid la rgas rgyud med pas phung po'i bdud bcom /
T02D2092:34a-0: sems nyid la skye shi med pas @34a * //
T02D2092:34a-2: sems nyid rtogs pas the tshom dang bral te lha'i bu'i bdud bcom /
T02D2092:34a-4: gal te bdud kyi tshogs ni bye ba dag / sangs rgyas skur bsgyur bar chad smra byas kyang //
T02D2092:34a-5: chos la mkhas pas chos nyid rang thob ste //
T02D2092:34a-6: de dag byang chub las ni bzlog mi nus //
T02D2092:34a-8: de lta bu de mchod pa'i 'os su bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2092:34a-11: rtag tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os //
T02D2092:34a-12: bkur 'os rjed par bya ba'i mchog / phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab //
T02D2092:34a-14: sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid rje btsun gyis 'jig rten pa rnam par thar pa'i gnas su 'dren pas /
T02D2092:34a-18: sku gzugs bris la mchod pa dang /
T02D2092:34a-20: phu dud du bkur ba dang /
T02D2092:34a-22: lus ngag yid gsum gus pas phyag bya bar 'os te /
T02D2092:34a-23: bla ma'i rab tu gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2092:34a-24: de'i mkhyen pa'i bye brag ci zhe na //
T02D2092:34a-25: 'jig rten gsum po go ma gcig bgrod //
T02D2092:34a-26: mkha' ltar mtha' med rnam par gnon //
T02D2092:34a-27: gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste //
T02D2092:34a-28: mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug / ces smos te /
T02D2092:34a-29: 'jig rten gsum po de shes rab kyi gom pa gcig gi bar du bgrod la /
T02D2092:34a-30: rtags rdzu 'phrul gyi gom pas bgrod do //
T02D2092:34a-31: nam mkha' ltar chos kyi sku mtha' med par rtogs pas nyon mongs pa gnon par byed do //
T02D2092:34a-32: de yang phyi sde snod gsum rig la /
T02D2092:34a-33: nang du sku gsung thugs rig ste /
T02D2092:34a-34: bdag gzhan gyi dri ma dang bral bas gtsang ma dag pa'o //
T02D2092:34a-35: gzhan yang mngon par shes pa drug ste /
T02D2092:34a-36: lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa dang /
T02D2092:34a-37: lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dang /
T02D2092:34a-38: pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /
T02D2092:34a-39: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang /
T02D2092:34a-40: rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa dang /
T02D2092:34a-41: zag pa zang pa'i mngon par shes pa'o //
T02D2092:34a-42: rjes su dran pa drug ni //
T02D2092:34a-43: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /
T02D2092:34a-44: chos rjes su dran pa dang /
T02D2092:34a-45: dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /
T02D2092:34a-46: dam tshig rjes su dran pa dang /
T02D2092:34a-47: thug rje rjes su dran pa dang /
T02D2092:34a-48: mdzad pa rjes su dran pa dang drug go//
T02D2092:34b-0: @34b shes rab dam pa ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2092:34b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02D2092:34b-3: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha' //
T02D2092:34b-4: shes rab kyis ni de nyid thob //
T02D2092:34b-6: byang chub sems dpa' ni rang don no //
T02D2092:34b-7: sems dpa' chen po ni gzhan don no //
T02D2092:34b-8: de yang byang chub ni nam mkha' lta bu'i chos kyi sku la /
T02D2092:34b-9: sems dpa' de ni de rtogs par 'dod pa'i 'dun pa yod pa dang /
T02D2092:34b-10: gzhan gyi don la dpa' ba'o //
T02D2092:34b-12: byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D2092:34b-13: kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
T02D2092:34b-14: gang zhig de rtogs 'dod pa de //
T02D2092:34b-15: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
T02D2092:34b-17: de yang rdzu 'phrul chen po brnyes te 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
T02D2092:34b-18: pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthar thug pa de kho na nyid ni /
T02D2092:34b-19: shes rab kyis thob par byed do //
T02D2092:34b-20: de nyid dpe las 'das par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2092:34b-21: bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa //
T02D2092:34b-22: kun la phan pa'i gang zag mchog / dper bya kun las 'das pa ste //
T02D2092:34b-23: shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog / ces smos te /
T02D2092:34b-24: ji lta ba bdag gi don dang /
T02D2092:34b-25: ji snyed pa gzhan gyi don thams cad rig pa'i sgo nas kun la phan par byed pa ste /
T02D2092:34b-26: gang zag ltar sprul kyang dngos ma yin pas mchog go //
T02D2092:34b-27: cung zad du yang mnyam pa med pas na dpe las 'das pa'o //
T02D2092:34b-28: shes par byed pa dang shes par bya ba'i don gnyis ka'i bdag po'i mchog tu gyur pa'o //
T02D2092:34b-29: gang gi sgo na shes par byed ce na //
T02D2092:34b-30: gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste //
T02D2092:34b-31: phyag rgya bzhi po don ston pa //
T02D2092:34b-32: 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog / nges 'byung gsum po bgrod rnams kyi //
T02D2092:34b-33: don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal //
T02D2092:34b-34: 'jig rten dzun na skal bzang che //
T02D2092:34b-36: rje btrzun nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gtso bor
T02D2092:34b-37: gyur bas kyang chos kyi sbyin pa ni sbyin pa
T02D2092:34b-38: rnams kyi gtso bor gyur pa'o //
T02D2092:34b-39: de'i bdag po ni rje btsun no //
T02D2092:34b-40: de phyag rgya bzhi'i chos ston te /
T02D2092:34b-41: de la yang bka' rtags kyi phyag rgya bzhi la /
T02D2092:34b-42: theg pa chung du'i bka' rtags kyi phyag rgya bzhi ni /
T02D2092:35a-1: rtag sdug bsngal stong dang bdag med pa //
T02D2092:35a-2: de ni rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i chos //
T02D2092:35a-5: bden bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa can //
T02D2092:35a-7: theg pa chen po'i dbang du byas na /
T02D2092:35a-13: bka' don rigs pa gtan tshigs dang //
T02D2092:35a-16: de la lha'i sku phyag rgya chen po bzhin /
T02D2092:35a-17: sku phyag rgya chen po'i / gsum chos kyi phyag rgya /
T02D2092:35a-18: thugs dam tshig gi phyag rgya /
T02D2092:35a-20: gdul bya lam gyi phyag rgya bzhi ni las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2092:35a-21: chos kyi phyag rgya dang phyag rgya chen po dang /
